name: ShortPlot-Movie
0:
”Alexa, ask Short Plot to give description of Deadpool”
”Alexa, give me the plot information of the movie Deadpool from Short Plot”
”Alexa, ask Short Plot to tell the plot of Deadpool”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: short plot
Developer Terms of Use
des: Want to know a short description of a movie your friend just recommended you to watch. Just ask your Alexa. Simple, short and precise plots of movies, series all available for you.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
